comments.en:
This is a mid-range 35ppm A3 printer with finishing capabilities. Most likely this printer will be configured with an integrated network card.
All Lexmark MarkNet network cards support LPR/LPD network printing in addition to printing to port 9100.

Consumables/Refills: Toner, Photoconductor;Toner=~US$131/20k pgs,Photo.=~US$443/90k p
